Servicing Activity Analysis: CR Servicing Root Cause Analysis Instance Record
column4: The type of root cause analysis - defines the scope and type of root cause issue that is being detected (e.g. service dialogue, click-stream, product processing issues, servicing representative performance)

Servicing Activity Analysis: CR Servicing Root Cause Analysis Instance Record
column4: The result of the servicing activity analysis - typically the consolidated view from applying multiple underlying root cause algorithms to highlight patterns that indicate potential root cause issues

Servicing Activity Analysis: CR Servicing Root Cause Analysis Instance Record
column4: An analysis of the root causes for the detected service anomalies

Servicing Activity Analysis: CR Servicing Root Cause Analysis Instance Record
column4: Proposed changes to procedures/organization etc that can mitigate the detected servicing issues

Servicing Activity Analysis: CR Servicing Root Cause Analysis Instance Record
column4: The raw data used in the analysis (retrieved from Servicing Activity History)

column3: Servicing Activity Root Cause Analysis Work Task Type

Servicing Activity Analysis: BQ Root Cause Algorithm Instance Record
column3: Servicing Activity Root Cause Analysis Work Task
column4: The make-up/schedule of the work task performed

column3: Servicing Activity Root Cause Analysis Work Task Work Products
column4: File of consolidated notes, evaluations and findings for the work task

Servicing Activity Analysis: BQ Root Cause Algorithm Instance Record
column3: Servicing Activity Root Cause Analysis Work Task Result
column4: Details of the outcome or result of the work task - indication of the nature of any identified servicing patterns and the associated root cause hypotheses
